summary: a young woman who was subjected to years of abuse by bega cheese boss maurice van ryn has told a court of the severe impact it had on her life . for years she kept what van ryn did to her a secret, but when she found out he had been caught she knew she had to break her silence . the wealthy nsw businessman has pleaded guilty to 12 sex offences, including the most serious charge of persistent sexual abuse of a child .
